data.name: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN - Sneaking Suit (The Boss)
data.detailed_description:
White Sneaking Suit that The Boss wore during Operation Snake Eater.
In addition to the noise-dampening soles that eliminate the sound of footsteps, this suit features a high-strength aramid weave that offers superb damage resistance.
* Usable by female DD Soldiers only. Cannot be used by Quiet.(Not usable in MGO)
*In FOB missions, this uniform prevents your body heat being detected by NVG-equipped enemies.
* Can be used with zipper in chest area open or closed.
* You must proceed to a certain point in the story and meet the proper development requirements before this item can be developed.
data.about_the_game:
White Sneaking Suit that The Boss wore during Operation Snake Eater.
In addition to the noise-dampening soles that eliminate the sound of footsteps, this suit features a high-strength aramid weave that offers superb damage resistance.

data.short_description: White Sneaking Suit that The Boss wore during Operation Snake Eater. In addition to the noise-dampening soles that eliminate the sound of footsteps, this suit features a high-strength aramid weave that offers superb damage resistance. *For female staff only.

fullgame.name: METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x64, Windows 8x64 (64-bit OS Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (3.40 GHz) or better; Quad-core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better (DirectX 11 card Required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x64, Windows 8x64 (64-bit OS Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 (3.60GHz) or better; Quad-core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (DirectX 11 graphic card required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card (Surround Sound 5.1)
